metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7653 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Debian python-rdflib-tools 4.2.2-1 package for RDFLib 4.2.2 has CLI tools that can load Python modules from the current working directory, allowing code injection, because "python -m" looks in this directory, as demonstrated by rdf2dot. This issue is specific to use of the debian/scripts directory.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> python-rdflib-tools binary package is in universe

criterions.comment: rdflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
